game.name: Buckshot Roulette
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play Russian roulette with a 12-gauge shotgun. Four enter. One leaves. Roll the dice with your life. Good luck!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play Russian roulette with a 12-gauge shotgun. Four enter. One leaves. Roll the dice with your life. Good luck!

reviewHighlights.text: A stupidly fun, addictive and hilarious game to play with friends. 10/10 would blow my friend's heads off again lol.
My favorite part of the game is when I confidently say "It's a blank" and then shoot myself and get greeted with a cutoff audio of me getting my face...
